tool.name: pRESTO FilterSeq
tool.description: Filters and/or masks reads based on length, quality, missing bases and repeats.
tool.command: ln -s '$fastq_in' in.fastq && FilterSeq.py '$cc.command' --nproc "\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1}" -s in.fastq #if $varExists('cc.q') -q '$cc.q' #end if #if $getVar('cc.inner', False) --inner #end if #if $varExists('cc.win') --win '$cc.win' #end if #if $getVar('cc.reverse', False) --reverse #end if #if $varExists('cc.n') -n '$cc.n' #end if --outdir=. --outname=tmp_filter_seq #if $capture_log --log '$log_out' #end if && mv ./tmp_filter_seq_${cc.command}-pass.fastq $fastq_out

param.name: command
param.label: Command
param.option: Filters reads by N or gap character count (missing)
Filters reads by consecutive nucleotide repeats (repeats)
Trims sequences by quality score decay (trimqual)

param.label: Minimum Length
param.help: Discard reads shorter than this number of bases long.

param.label: Max Missing
param.help: Dicard reads with more than this many no-calls or gaps.

param.label: Max Repeat Length
param.help: Discard reads with simple repeats of this length of longer.

param.label: Minimum Quality
param.help: Discard reads with mean quality below this value.

param.label: End-Trim Ns
param.help: Exclude Ns at the ends of the reads from calculation.

param.label: Minimum Quality
param.help: Discard reads with mean quality below this value.

param.label: Minimum Quality
param.help: Discard reads with mean quality below this value.

param.label: Window Size
param.help: Window size for moving average quality calculation.

param.label: Reverse
param.help: If true trim the start of the reads instead of the ends.
